page.title: 02The Lambton Estate
page.content: { Lord Lambton}is one of the largest land owners in England.Most of the {park}is{wooded}and{50,000 pheasant}are bred.Of these,{21,000}are released during the shooting season.The late {Earl of Durham}had a{racecourse}built and foals,brought from Newmarket,were trained on the estate.{Gymkhanas}are held in the Paddock and{RAC rallies take place around the park.The estate has its own{sawmill}and houses are built from the timber.Mr Collinson who has lived by one of the lodge gates for 75 years remembers{King George V's visit in{1926.}Other famous visitors have included the Earl of Avon,Lord Hume,King Carlos of Spain,Princess Margaret,Prince Rainier of Monaco and Mr.Ford of Ford Cars,America.The Castle was used to{billet officers during the war and later as a{College {of Education.
